reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan beautiful and appreciate its nice color. The wool is soft, with one customer noting it's not itchy at all, and they find it warm and extremely comfortable. They like the fit, with one mentioning the sleeves are plenty long, and praise its quality, with one describing it as a work of art.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Color just a bit different than the photo shows....
items.body: Gorgeous light teal color, not nearly as blue as the photo shows. Very pretty and nice and warm. I wish the teeth on the zipper were metal (rather than plastic), but other than that, it's a very pretty sweater. And I put it on over a short sleeve shirt, and didn't really feel all that itchy to me. I could tell it was wool, as it wasn't as soft as the inside of the fleece sweatshirt I had been wearing earlier today, but I didn't expect it to be either... Sleeves were plenty long to reach my hands as well. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth Wittman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous sweater
items.body: I own several sweaters of this type, love then all, but I have to say that this one is my favorite. The color is to die for, and the fit is perfect. I’m 5’8, 160#, and the medium fits like it custom made. If you are hesitant about the shipping from Ireland, don’t be; I received it in about a week, which beats a lot of online stores shipping times. The wool is not scratchy, and the knit pattern is close enough to appear elegant, as opposed to those ultra bulky cable knits that just end up looking sloppy, and the stand up collar is a nice touch (more elegance). I believe that you get what you pay for, so I was happy with the price. This is not a cheap, throwaway sweater, it is a sweater heirloom that will probably outlive me, moths willing. Read more
items.author: Wheelhouse60

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic look and warmth
items.body: This sweater is fantastic. Well worth the wait the wool is not itchy at all iam considering getting another. Get one you won’t regret it Read more
items.author: sandy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft beautiful and made to last forever
items.body: Gorgeous sweater. One that will last forever. The wool is so soft and the blue color is gorgeous. I found it to run large. I normally take medium (5'1" 139) and Im returning this one for a small. Read more
items.author: P Squared

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Color and quality!
items.body: Beautiful color and craftsmanship. My only complaint is that it’s not a dense knit. Zipper is sturdy and I love the high neck. Cozy! Read more
items.author: athomesherbear

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm & Beautiful!
items.body: BEAUTIFUL SWEATER! I'm very satisfied❤️ Read more
items.author: American Express

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, nice color
items.body: Omg, the softest cozy wool sweater. The dark green is really nice. Side entry pockets won’t sag. So glad I got this. Read more
items.author: Toobizzee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding Quality Irish Sweater
items.body: Excellent international service and a stunning work of art by talented Irish weavers. Will last generations and is already a wonderful addition to my cold weather attire. Read more
items.author: Kim

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Army Green, Mermaid, Natural. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
